ComicInfo.Summary:
Yup, it's that time of year again (Turkey Time!), where we stop everything to give thanks: Thanks to all those movies this year that were ripe for parody. Thanks to all the celebrities, sports figures and politicians for being there to make fun of. And thanks to you, our loyal readers, for buying twenty copies each of this issue of MAD MAGAZINE. We're sure the karma wheel will come back your way eventually...
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:24:55. [Issue ID 130292]

ComicInfo.Title: Snappy Answers to Stupid Questions: Special Sports Edition!; Designs; Another Mad Look at Plastic Surgery; Duck Edwing’s Movie Outtakes — Scenes So Bad They Didn’t Even Make the DVD — This Month: Spider-Man; How the Economic Recession is Affecting Certain Fringe Businesses; One Fine Day in the Hospital; The Bunion; Monroe and… Identity Theft; If Martha’s Calendar Really Reported What Martha is Doing; Mad's All-Inclusive Do-It-Yourself Corporate Scandal Newspaper Story; Harry Plodder and the Lamest of Sequels
